ru.ifmo.ctddev.zemskov.implementor

Class ImplementCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ifmo.ctddev.zemskov.implementor.ImplementCreator

  • public class ImplementCreator
extends Object
    Processes one class and generates an implementation for it through implement()

    Expected usage is the following: 

         new ImplementCreator(MyClass.class, "MyClassImpl", new FileWriter(new File("MyClassImpl.java")))

    See Also:
    Implementor

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImplementCreator

        public ImplementCreator(Class clazz,
                        String newClassName,
                        Appendable out)
                 throws ImplerException
        Class constructor, specifying which class to implement (clazz), name to give to the implementation (newClassName and place, where to write it (out).
        Parameters:
        clazz - class to implement
        newClassName - name of class to be generated
        out - where the implementation will be placed
        Throws:
        ImplerException - If any of the following is true:
        • clazz is primitive.
        • clazz is final.

    • Method Detail

      • implement

        public void implement()
               throws IOException,
                      ImplerException
        Produces code implementing current class or interface clazz and places it to out.

        Produced code will be correct Java code and will be successfully compiled by Java compiler. New class' package will be equal to initial class' package It will super all available constructors from parent, or, if there is no any constructor (all parents are interfaces), it will leave default constructor. All abstract methods will be overridden. No fields or new methods will be generated.

        Throws:
        IOException - if couldn't write to out
        ImplerException - if there is no correct implementation for clazz
        See Also:
        writePackage(), writeClassDeclaration(), writeMethods()

      • writeClassDeclaration

        private void writeClassDeclaration()
                            throws IOException
        Writes implementation's class declaration to out

        Copies all parents modifiers excluding abstract.

        Throws:
        IOException - if couldn't write to out
        See Also:
        Class.getModifiers(), writeModifiers(int, int)

      • writeConstructors

        private void writeConstructors()
                        throws IOException,
                               ImplerException
        Writes implementation's class constructors to out

        Supers all non-private constructors, declared in parent. Copies all parent constructor exceptions and passes default values to it.

        Throws:
        IOException - if couldn't write to out
        ImplerException - if there is no non-private constructor in clazz and it's not an interface
        See Also:
        writeParameters(Parameter[], boolean), writeModifiers(int, int)

      • getMethods

        private void getMethods(Class<?> base,
                        Set<ImplementCreator.HashebleMethod> methods)
        Get all non-private declared methods from class and his ancestors using recursion and push them in TreeMap
        Parameters:
        base - Current class for getting all his non-private methods
        methods - Where we save methods we got

      • writeMethods

        private void writeMethods()
                   throws IOException
        Writes implementation class' declaration to out

        Overrides all abstract methods from ancestors. Copies access modifier from ancestor method and returns default value for return type. Copies all exceptions, declared in ancestor method

        Throws:
        IOException - if couldn't write to out
        See Also:
        defaultReturnValue(Type), writeParameters(Parameter[], boolean), writeModifiers(int, int), getMethods(Class, Set)

      • writeHead

        private void writeHead(String retType,
                       String name,
                       Parameter[] params,
                       Class<?>[] excs)
                throws IOException
        Writes header for constructor or method to out
        Parameters:
        retType - return type for methods, empty string for constructors
        name - name of constructor/class
        params - parameters of constructor/class
        excs - exceptions of constructor/class
        Throws:
        IOException - if couldn't write to out
        See Also:
        writeParameters(Parameter[], boolean)

      • writeParameters

        private void writeParameters(Parameter[] params,
                             boolean writeTypes)
                      throws IOException
        Writes parameters of constructor or method to out
        Parameters:
        params - parameters of constructor/class
        writeTypes - true if need to write types of parametrs, false if only names of parametrs
        Throws:
        IOException - if couldn't write to out

      • writeModifiers

        public void writeModifiers(int mod,
                           int type)
                    throws IOException
        Writes modifiers of constructor, class or method to out
        Parameters:
        mod - all modifiers of class
        type - all modifiers avaliable for class/constructor/method
        Throws:
        IOException - if couldn't write to out

      • defaultReturnValue

        private String defaultReturnValue(Type type)
        Gets some correct value for type

        It returns only 0, false and null really.

        Parameters:
        type - type, which default value to get
        Returns:
        string, representing some correct value for specified type

      • writePackage

        private void writePackage()
                   throws IOException
        Writes implementation's package name to out
        Throws:
        IOException - if couldn't write to out
